statements: SELECT * FROM MatchSchedule;
SELECT home_team, away_team, location FROM MatchSchedule WHERE result = 'Draw';
SELECT match_id, match_date FROM MatchSchedule WHERE match_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT home_team, result FROM MatchSchedule WHERE match_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT location, result FROM MatchSchedule WHERE home_team = 'Barcelona' AND away_team = 'Real Madrid';
SELECT * FROM MatchSchedule WHERE home_team = 'Barcelona';
SELECT match_date, location FROM MatchSchedule WHERE result = 'Draw' ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT match_id, home_team, away_team FROM MatchSchedule WHERE match_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY match_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM MatchSchedule WHERE match_date >= '2022-01-01' AND match_date <= '2022-12-31' AND result = 'Win' ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_matches FROM MatchSchedule GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_matches DESC;
SELECT * FROM MatchSchedule WHERE match_id = 1;
SELECT team1, match_date FROM MatchSchedule WHERE team2 = 'Team A';
SELECT match_id, team1, team2 FROM MatchSchedule ORDER BY match_id DESC;
SELECT winner, loser FROM MatchResults WHERE winning_score > losing_score;
SELECT * FROM MatchSchedule WHERE team1 = 'Team B' AND match_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MatchSchedule WHERE team1 = 'Team A' AND team2 = 'Team B';
SELECT match_date, team1, team2 FROM MatchSchedule WHERE match_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT team1, team2, winner FROM MatchSchedule JOIN MatchResults ON MatchSchedule.match_id = MatchResults.match_id WHERE winning_score > losing_score;
SELECT team1, team2, winning_score FROM MatchSchedule JOIN MatchResults ON MatchSchedule.match_id = MatchResults.match_id WHERE losing_score < 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_matches FROM MatchSchedule;
SELECT * FROM MatchSchedules
SELECT match_id, match_date, location FROM MatchSchedules ORDER BY match_date DESC
SELECT winner_team, losing_score FROM MatchResults WHERE winning_score > losing_score
SELECT team_name, goals_scored, possession FROM MatchStatistics WHERE possession >= 50.00 ORDER BY goals_scored DESC
SELECT match_id, match_time, location FROM MatchSchedules WHERE match_time BETWEEN '12:00:00' AND '18:00:00'
SELECT * FROM MatchSchedules ORDER BY match_date DESC, match_time ASC, location;
SELECT match_id, match_date, location FROM MatchSchedules WHERE location = 'Stadium A';
SELECT winner_team, loser_team, winning_score, losing_score FROM MatchResults WHERE winning_score > losing_score ORDER BY result_id DESC;
SELECT team_name, goals_scored, possession FROM MatchStatistics WHERE fouls_committed < 10 ORDER BY goals_scored DESC;
SELECT * FROM MatchResults mr JOIN MatchStatistics ms ON mr.match_id = ms.match_id WHERE mr.winning_score > 2 AND ms.goals_scored > 0 ORDER BY mr.match_id ASC, ms.team_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM match_schedule;
SELECT team1, team2, venue FROM match_schedule WHERE match_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT match_date, team1, team2 FROM match_schedule WHERE venue LIKE '%stadium%';
SELECT * FROM result ORDER BY match_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT team_name, coach_name, location FROM team;
SELECT * FROM match_schedule WHERE match_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT team1, team2, venue FROM match_schedule WHERE venue='Stadium A';
SELECT * FROM result WHERE winner='Team X' AND score LIKE '%-0';
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists FROM statistics WHERE assists > 5 ORDER BY goals_scored DESC;
SELECT team_name, coach_name, location FROM team WHERE location='City Y' ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM matches;
SELECT match_id, match_date, stadium_name, home_team, away_team FROM matches WHERE match_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT match_id, match_time, home_team, away_team, stadium_name FROM matches ORDER BY match_time DESC;
SELECT winner, total_goals, outcome FROM results WHERE total_goals >= 3;
SELECT team_name, total_matches, wins, losses, draws FROM team_stats ORDER BY wins DESC, total_matches ASC;
SELECT * FROM matches WHERE match_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT home_team, away_team, match_date FROM matches WHERE stadium_name = 'Wembley Stadium';
SELECT match_id, match_time, stadium_name FROM matches ORDER BY match_time DESC;
SELECT results.winner, matches.stadium_name, results.total_goals FROM results JOIN matches ON results.match_id = matches.match_id;
SELECT team_name, wins, losses, draws FROM team_stats WHERE total_matches > 10 ORDER BY wins DESC;
